attributes.title: Roomba Death Match - Happy Hour #1
attributes.caption: Roomba Death Match
attributes.description: Gav, Geoff and Griffon embark on a drunken journey that spans the better part of a decade. Tune in every few weeks to watch them dare and drink their way across the world and time. In this week's episode, they turn their fleet of Roombas into driving death machines. Who will kill first

attributes.title: Minty Fresh - Happy Hour #2
attributes.caption: Minty Fresh
attributes.description: Gavin, Geoff, and Griffon embark on a drunken journey that spans the better part of a decade. Tune in every few weeks to watch them dare and drink their way across the world and time. In this week's episode, they challenge Geoff to eat two packets of mints at once.

attributes.title: Jump Rope Training - Happy Hour #3
attributes.caption: Jump Rope Training
attributes.description: Gavin challenges Geoff and Griffon to do something so physically demanding, most Olympians couldn't handle it. Will it end in success, or a trip to the Hospital

attributes.title: Geoff's Colonoscopy - Happy Hour #4
attributes.caption: Geoff's Colonoscopy
attributes.description: In this week's gripping Happy Hour, Griffon Ramsey gets and in-depth interview with Geoff moments after he gets a camera in the depths of his anus.

attributes.title: The Crimper - Happy Hour #5
attributes.caption: The Crimper
attributes.description: Things are heating up in this week's Happy Hour, as Griffon attempts to give Gavin and Geoff a hair makeover.

attributes.title: A Hairy Situation - Happy Hour #6
attributes.caption: A Hairy Situation
attributes.description: In the sixth episode of Happy Hour, Geoff Ramsey, Griffon Ramsey, and Gavin Free get the grossest haircut of all time.

attributes.title: Ramsey-Free Spit Off  - Happy Hour #7
attributes.caption: Ramsey-Free Spit Off
attributes.description: Geoff Ramsey, Griffon Ramsey, and Gavin Free find themselves in Portland with nothing to do, but to compete in a spit off.

attributes.title: Doctors of the Peggle Arts - Happy Hour #8
attributes.caption: Doctors of the Peggle Arts
attributes.description: The three G's (Gavin Free, Geoff and Griffon Ramsey) complete the ultimate challenge, fulfilling all of their life's goals, and thus cementing their names in infamy, ranking among greats like Ghengis Khan, Napoleon, General Patton, and Eric the Actor. Congrats you Gorgeous Gs. You've climbed the mountain, fought the good fight, soared through the heavens, and lived to tell the tail. All of humanity salutes you. Huzzah!
attributes.display_title: Doctors of the Peggle Arts - Happy Hour #8

attributes.title: The Paddle - Happy Hour #9
attributes.caption: The Paddle
attributes.description: Gavin Free, Griffon Ramsey, and Meg Turney are assholes. They hate Geoff, they are jealous of Geoff, and they do everything in their power to punish Geoff for his honesty, chivalry, and all around good nature. Pray for Geoff. These hateful hangers' on are doing everything in their power to destroy his virtue and steal his essence.

attributes.title: Parking - Happy Hour #10
attributes.caption: Parking
attributes.description: Gav and Geoff try and park in downtown Austin.

attributes.title: Back Popping - Happy Hour #11
attributes.caption: Back Popping
attributes.description: Things are tense in this Happy Hour as Griffon and Geoff pop backs.
